network-firewall
****************


Description
===========

A network firewall is a security resource that exists in a subnet of
your choice and controls incoming and outgoing network traffic based
on a set of security rules. Each firewall is associated with a policy.
Traffic is routed to and from the firewall from resources such as
internet gateways and dynamic routing gateways (DRGs). For more
information, see Overview of Network Firewall


Available Commands
==================

* change-compartment

* create

* delete

* get

* list

* update
